titleInfo.title: USA v. Robinson et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 23 Motion to Extend as to John N. Griffy. Pretrial Motion Deadline set for 7/2/2010. The additional time arising as a result of the granting of the motion, i.e., the time between June 17, 2010 and July 2, 2010, shall be deemed excludable time in any computation of time under the requirement of the Speedy Trial Act. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken. ( GJG)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 8:10-cr-00193; USA v. Robinson et al;

titleInfo.title: USA v. Robinson et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendants Deandre W. Robinson and John N. Griffy granting 36 and 37 Motions to Continue. The Change of Plea Hearing for both defendants is continued to 9/8/2010 at 10:00 AM in Courtroom 7, Federal Building, 111 South 18th Plaza, Omaha, NE before Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken. The time between 08/03/2010 and the hearing on the anticipated plea of guilty is excluded for purposes of computing the limits under the Speedy Trial Act. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. titleInfo.title: USA v. Robinson et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant John N. Griffy (3). This matter is before the court on the motion of defendant John N. Griffy (Griffy) to review detention (Filing No. 57). After reviewing the Pretrial Services report, Griffy's criminal and substance abuse history, the motion to review detention and request for an evidentiary hearing is denied. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken. (GJG)
